sense.def:
To see something
pomeni nekaj zaznati z očmi.

seg.quote: I saw him glance at his watch.
He went to India to see the Taj Mahal.
Did you see ‘The Doctor's Dilemma’ on telly last night?
Some animals have the ability to see in very dim light.

sense.def:
To go to see someone
pomeni obiskati nekoga ali se z njim srečati.

seg.quote: Perhaps she did not wish to come and see me.
It would be a good idea for you to see a doctor for a checkup.

sense.def:
To see someone to a particular place
pomeni iti z nekom do določenega kraja, da bi videli, ali je varno prišel tja.

seg.quote: I went down to see her safely to her car.

sense.def:
To see that something is true or exists
pomeni, da se potem, ko nekaj natančno opazujemo ali o nečem razmislimo, začnemo zavedati, da je tisto res ali da obstaja.

seg.quote: Etta could see that he wasn't listening.
She begins to see that she has a choice.

sense.def:
To see what someone means
ali
to see why something happened
pomeni doumeti, kaj nekdo hoče reči ali zakaj se je nekaj zgodilo.

seg.quote: ‘Yes,’ she said. ‘I see what you mean.’
I can see why Mr Smith is worried.
Somebody got killed and I don't see how.

sense.def:
Z besedo
see
tudi povemo, da imamo namen ugotoviti, kaj se dogaja ali kakšen je položaj.

seg.quote: I'd better go and see what he wants.
I must phone her up and see if she can come tonight.

sense.def:
To see that something is done
pomeni prepričati se, da je nekaj res narejeno.

seg.quote: See that everything is marked with your initials.

sense.def:
To see a situation or someone's behaviour in a particular way
pomeni, da si položaj ali človekovo ravnanje razlagamo na določen način.

seg.quote: I did not see his determination as a defect.
The problem, as I see it, is not advice but direct help.

sense.def:
Kadar človek ali neko obdobje
sees a particular change or event
, se tista sprememba ali dogodek zgodi takrat, ko je določen človek živ, ali v določenem obdobju.

seg.quote: In recent times we have seen a huge split develop between rich and poor nations.
How would you like to see education changed?

sense.def:
To see something happening in the future
pomeni, da si zamišljamo ali napovedujemo, da se bo nekaj zgodilo v prihodnosti.

seg.quote: She saw herself seated behind the cash register, smiling.
Can you see women going into combat carrying forty-pound guns?

sense.def:
Izraz
see
se v knjigah uporablja kot napotek bralcem, kje naj poiščejo dodatne podatke o neki témi.

seg.quote: Reference to this problem is made elsewhere (see Chapter 14).

sense.def:
To see if one can do something
pomeni poskusiti, ali nekaj lahko naredimo.

seg.quote: See if you can find my birthday book somewhere.

sense.def:
To see what one can do
pomeni potruditi se, da bi pomagali nekomu, ki nas je prosil za pomoč.

Z izrazoma
I'll see
ali
we'll see
pokažemo, da se ne nameravamo odločiti takoj, temveč pozneje.

seg.quote: ‘Will you write to me?’ she asked. ‘I'll see,’ he said.

sense.def:
Let me see
ali
let's see
rečemo, kadar se poskušamo nečesa spomniti ali nekaj najti.

seg.quote: I think I've got her name somewhere. Now let me see.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
I see
pokažemo, da razumemo, kar nam nekdo pripoveduje.

seg.quote: ‘Humbert is Dolly's real father.’—‘I see.’

sense.def:
Z izrazom
seeing that
ali
seeing as
uvedemo razlog za tisto, kar delamo ali pripovedujemo;

seg.quote: Seeing that you're the guest on this little trip, you can decide where we're going.

sense.def:
See you
in
see you later
sta pogovorna izraza ob slovesu, ko pričakujemo, da bomo nekoga kmalu spet videli.

To see about something
pomeni urediti, da bo nekaj narejeno ali zagotovljeno.

seg.quote: Rudolph went into the station to see about Thomas's ticket.

sense.def:
Če nekdo reče, da bo nekaj naredil, mi pa na to odvrnemo
we'll see about that
, hočemo reči, da mu nameravamo to preprečiti.

Kadar vprašamo, kaj nekdo
sees in a particular person
, želimo vedeti, kaj na tisti osebi nekoga privlači.

seg.quote: ‘What can she see in him?’

sense.def:
To see through someone
ali
to see through what someone is doing
pomeni, da nekomu uspe ugotoviti, kakšni so nameni neke osebe, čeprav jih ta poskuša prikriti.

seg.quote: She had learned to see through him.
The jailers saw through my scheme.

sense.def:
To see to something
pomeni poskrbeti za nekaj, kar je treba urediti.

seg.quote: Don't you worry about that. I'll see to that.
He went out to see to the chickens.
